wikipedia_page.main: Maya Bruney (born 24 February 1998) is a pro track athlete and creative, competing for Italy in the 200m, 400m, 4 × 100 m and 4 × 400 m events. She is a BRIT School design graduate and has a degree in graphic design.Maya became the only athlete to achieve a hat-trick of medals at the 2017 European Athletics U20 Championships. She became the 2017 European Junior 200m Champion, 4 x 100-metre relay bronze medalist and 4 x 400-metre relay bronze medalist, placing Britain top of the medal table at the Championships. She broke Shirley Thomas's 30-year-old Surrey record for the 200 metres, running 23.04 seconds and set the 2017 European Junior 200m Leading Time.
